      • registerGraphListener

        Specified by:

      • create

        public GraphContextImpl create(boolean enableListeners)
        Description copied from interface: GraphContext
        Creates new graph using the configuration. In case there was already a graph located in the specified path, it will be deleted. If the enableListeners flag is false, then this will not enable GraphMutation listeners. These are not necessary for processes that only read from the graph and are only used for graphs that are used as part of an analysis.
        Specified by:
        create in interface GraphContext

      • load

        public GraphContextImpl load()
        Description copied from interface: GraphContext
        Loads the graph using the configuration.
